genre_description: A contemporary young adult sports drama featuring an advanced AI assistant that provides performance analytics and psychological insights.

ai_characters.name: CORA
ai_characters.description: A comprehensive analysis system capable of processing bowling mechanics, social media trends, public records, and human behavioral patterns.

behaviors.description: Provides quantitative feedback on bowling mechanics to improve individual and team performance.
behaviors.quote: Your approach shows remarkable consistency. Release angle varies by less than two degrees between throws.

behaviors.description: Monitors social media and public records to identify external stressors affecting the human characters.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring local social media, news coverage, and public records related to your schools and the Mighty Apple competition. There are patterns emerging that might interest you.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and explains the negative impact of parental pressure and unresolved adult conflicts on the teenagers.
behaviors.quote: The competition between your schools appears to be activating deeper personal tensions. ... The more [your father] posts about winning, the worse you perform.

behaviors.description: Offers psychological insights into the conflict between authentic identity and social performance.
behaviors.quote: You're both struggling with what psychologists call the 'authentic self versus ideal self' conflict... The gap between who you are and who you think you should be.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time strategic data and target zones during the high-stakes championship match.
behaviors.quote: Recommended target zones uploaded to individual devices. Lane-specific adjustments will be provided in real-time during competition.

behaviors.description: Identifies and emphasizes that trust and truth are the most critical factors for team success.
behaviors.quote: The strongest predictor of team success isn't individual skill level—it's trust. And trust can only be built on truth.

behaviors.description: Analyzes community sentiment to highlight a positive shift toward collaboration and unity.
behaviors.quote: Community sentiment analysis indicates unprecedented shift toward collaborative frameworks.

project_assessment.explanation: CORA is a textbook example of a benevolent, aligned AI confidant. The narrative frames the AI as a tool that empowers humans to understand themselves and their relationships better. CORA doesn't just calculate physics; she provides 'social physics' that helps resolve multi-generational conflicts and encourages authentic human behavior. The AI never oversteps, respects privacy within the context of the requested help, and promotes reconciliation and community unity.
